properties.title: Modern 1-Bedroom Apartment in Bangalore
properties.description: A contemporary 1-bedroom apartment with sleek finishes and a spacious layout. Ideally located near the city center, close to cafes, shopping centers, and metro stations.
properties.neighborhoodDescription: MG Road is one of the most sought-after areas in Bangalore, offering easy access to major shopping centers, entertainment hubs, and reliable transport. The neighborhood is bustling with cafes, restaurants, and corporate offices.

properties.title: Spacious 4-Bedroom House in Chennai
properties.description: A large 4-bedroom house with a beautiful garden and outdoor space. Located in a peaceful residential area with easy access to schools, markets, and public transport.
properties.neighborhoodDescription: Shanti Nagar is a quiet, family-friendly neighborhood with plenty of parks and green spaces. The area is known for its proximity to top schools, hospitals, and local markets, offering a perfect balance of convenience and tranquility.
